name: JeuxDesTerrains
description:
Developed by Maria Velaora for Le Studio Dièse

Instructions : 

Print Screenshot : kindergarten , Nantes, France 

Download Jeux De Terrains.apk

Use the augmented reality application to scan the printed Sceenshot and play by moving, rotating and zooming the augmented object into the kindergarten.

Genre : Educational application, Architecture, Jeu ludique
